item.title: About Me
item.description:
Aniruddha Mandal

I am a PhD researcher in Graph Neural Networks at Indian Statistical Institute.
My research focuses on graph neural networks, subgraph sampling, information theory and their applications in natural sciences.

Research Interests

  • Graph theory & machine learning
  • Subgraph-based neural architectures
  • Information theory & topology
  • Applications of AI in science
